person.content:

Paragraph: Witnesses said Belo left the territory for the Indonesian capital Jakarta accompanied by five other people .

| Person     |

| Person     |
|------------|
| Belo       |

The only clear "Person" entity in the paragraph is "Belo". The phrase "five other people" is too vague to be considered a clear "Person" entity.
